overview:
Jean-Louis Casabonne is responsible for all financial aspects of Quova’s business. As chief financial officer, he is responsible for guiding the company’s growth, including subscription and license revenue, and all corporate financial matters.

He was previously co-founder, CFO and vice president of finance at Inxight Software, a spinoff from Xerox PARC. He also held multiple management-level finance positions at Xerox, where he helped to launch three subsidiary companies.

Casabonne began his finance career at Lockheed Missiles & Space Company, and has been involved with other entrepreneurial businesses. He earned his BS and MBA degrees at Santa Clara University.
